to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Re: fedora live and speech
body:
It is my understanding that the graphical installation of Fedora
provided by the Live CD is not yet accessible. There is talk that it
needs to be made accessible, but don't expect that from the current
release.

As to how to start speech, hold Ctrl-S for a second or two at the GDM
beep.

Janina

Michael Weaver writes:
> Can the live CD of Fedora be run with speech before installation?
> I downloaded the Live CD as I don't have a DVD drive on my laptop.
> If speech can be run from the Live F7 CD how is it done?
> 
> _______________________________________________
> Speakup mailing list
> Speakup@braille.uwo.ca
> http://speech.braille.uwo.ca/mailman/listinfo/speakup
